item.title: Issues while renewing Passport - the JS one
item.description: No, am not talking about my actual passport, which also needs to be renewed soon by the way. Am talking about PassportJS.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: My very first post after a very very long haitus! Too much has happened. It’s overwhelming. The hope is with this blog sanity prevails the world becomes a happier place. First things first : 1. Test the powers of Hexo and come up with a URL scheme 1. Import all previous blog (or at-leat point to them) 1. Ensure all DNS setting are properly set 1. Test if the blog works online 1.
